name: OR_IMP_COMMENTS
description: The OR_IMP_COMMENTS table contains OR management system implant comments.

columns.name: IMPLANT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the implant record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The number of the line of the comment information for the implant.

columns.name: COMMENTS_MULT
columns.description: One line of comments stored for the implant.
